  • Search

SearchÂ¶

A search field is on the right side above the table. You can manually enter search terms here. The table entries are dynamically filtered based on this search term and irrelevant entries are hidden. The search field has to be cleared for all entries to be fully displayed again.

In addition to descriptions or values of KPIs, you can also search for the state. When doing so, you can filter in the search field based on the corresponding traffic light color in text form. If you would like to have all negative states displayed, you have to filter for red in the search field. This search also functions the same way for alternative language settings of the client; in the example just given, this means you would have to filter for rot if the language is set to German.
